document.full_text: a graffiti artist whose work went on display this month at a prestigious los angeles museum was sentenced to 45 days in prison on wednesday for practicing the same craft in new york.
document.title: graffiti artist's work lands him in museum and jail
lines_and_colors: a graffiti artist whose work went on display this month at a prestigious los angeles museum was sentenced to 45 days in prison on wednesday for practicing the same craft in new york.
